title: A good mouse
description: My mouse is pretty good. I've replaced it three times, but it's pretty good.

title: IBM chief says employees' careers could suffer and promotions may be harder to achieve if they work from home
description: If there was a more subtle, yet assertive way to discourage your employees from remote work, I'm not familair with it.

title: S3 domain claimed on Bluesky by someone who doesn't own the domain
description: Bluesky: "Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me ..."

title: WHO downgrades COVID pandemic, says it's no longer a global emergency
description: I kind of prefer living my life worrying, though. I feel like that's the healthy way to proceed.
